item.title: Estee Lauder Among Global Beauty Brands Doubling Down India Push Amid Saturation In Developed Markets: Report
item.description: India's luxury beauty market is expected to quintuple to $4 billion by 2035 from $800 million in 2023, according to Reuters.

item.title: Why Is Nordson Stock Rising In Premarket Trading?
item.description: The company reported adjusted earnings of $2.73 per share for the quarter ended July 31, while analysts expected it to post $2.64 per share, according...

item.title: Tejas Networks, Indo Farm, Everest Industries Among Top Analyst Stock Picks This Week
item.description: Technical charts point to strong momentum in Tejas Networks, Everest Industries, Indo Farm, and Shree Digvijay Cement.

item.title: Eurozone’s Factory Activity Surges To Over 3-Year High Despite Trump Tariffs
item.description: New orders also grew in August, ending a 14-month streak of declines.

item.title: Tesla’s German Plant Partially Evacuated After Fire At Battery Processing Site: Report
item.description: The fire reportedly occurred in a building that processes battery packs.
